stepDownEnabled.label: STEP-DOWN ABILITATO
stepDownEnabled.log:
==============================================================
  MARTIN AI v4.8 - RECOVERY MARTINGALE + CYCLE TRACKING   
==============================================================

MODALITA 1 (NORMALE):
   - Payout: 3.1x
   - Base Bet: 1.00 bits
   - Multiplier: 1.6x (CUSTOM)
   - Bonus: +1 bit per le prime 3 perdite

MODALITA 2 (RECUPERO MARTINGALE):
   - Trigger: 16 perdite consecutive
   - Payout: 2x
   - Max tentativi: 2

CAPITALE & TARGET (PER CICLO):
   - Working Balance: 1000.00 bits
   - Target Profit: 75% (+750.00 bits)
   - Continue Cycles: SI (analisi multipli cicli)

ğŸ² MARTINGALE SUL VIRTUAL BALANCE:
   - ABILITATO: Aumenta VB dopo ogni perdita
   - Moltiplicatore: ~2.33x (per TP 75%)
   - VB Base: 1000.00 bits
   - Reset a VB base dopo ogni vittoria
   - Max Consecutive Losses: 6 (protezione capitale)

ğŸ“‰ STEP-DOWN RECOVERY:
   - ABILITATO: Strategia ibrida (40% debt retention)
   - FASE ALTA (L4+): Obiettivo = tornare a L3 (zona sicura)
     â€¢ L5+ â†’ L3 (emergency, evita overflow)
     â€¢ L4 â†’ L3 (rientro in zona sicura)
   - FASE BASSA (L1-3): Obiettivo = chiudere gradualmente con buffer
     â€¢ L3 â†’ L2 (conservativo), L2 â†’ L0, L1 â†’ L0
   - Debt Retention: Mantieni 40% perdite (buffer protezione)
   - Step-Down Dinamico INTRA-CICLO:
     â€¢ Ogni 5 vittorie consecutive @ L4+ â†’ scendi 1 livello
     â€¢ Abbassa bet DURANTE il ciclo (non aspetta fine ciclo)

==============================================================

CYCLE #1 WON | Profit: +760 bits | WR: 100.0% (1W/0L) | Max Loss Streak: 0 | VB: 1000 bits
CYCLE #2 LOST | Loss: -822 bits | WR: 50.0% (1W/1L) | Loss Streak: 1/1 | Next VB: 2095 bits
CYCLE #3 WON | Profit: +1577 bits | WR: 66.7% (2W/1L) | Max Loss Streak: 1 | Down: L1â†’L0 | VB: 2095 bits
CYCLE #4 LOST | Loss: -616 bits | WR: 50.0% (2W/2L) | Loss Streak: 1/1 | Next VB: 1822 bits
CYCLE #5 WON | Profit: +1374 bits | WR: 60.0% (3W/2L) | Max Loss Streak: 1 | Down: L1â†’L0 | VB: 1822 bits
CYCLE #6 LOST | Loss: -834 bits | WR: 50.0% (3W/3L) | Loss Streak: 1/1 | Next VB: 2112 bits
CYCLE #7 LOST | Loss: -1342 bits | WR: 42.9% (3W/4L) | Loss Streak: 2/2 | Next VB: 3901 bits
CYCLE #8 LOST | Loss: -3242 bits | WR: 37.5% (3W/5L) | Loss Streak: 3/3 (1x) | Next VB: 8223 bits
CYCLE #9 WON | Profit: +6319 bits | WR: 44.4% (4W/5L) | Max Loss Streak: 3 | Streaks 3+: [3x:1] | Down: L3â†’L2 | VB: 8223 bits

ğŸ“‰ STEP-DOWN RECOVERY (40% retention)
   Livello 3 â†’ Livello 2
   VB: 8223 â†’ 3889 bits
   Debito: 5418 â†’ 2167 bits (-3251 bits cancellati)
   BaseBet: 4.00 bits

CYCLE #10 LOST | Loss: -2980 bits | WR: 40.0% (4W/6L) | Loss Streak: 3/3 (2x) | Next VB: 7863 bits
CYCLE #11 LOST | Loss: -5732 bits | WR: 36.4% (4W/7L) | Loss Streak: 4/4 (1x) | Next VB: 15506 bits
CYCLE #12 LOST | Loss: -13102 bits | WR: 33.3% (4W/8L) | Loss Streak: 5/5 (1x) | Next VB: 32975 bits

âŒ ERRORE: BaseBet troppo grande!
   newBaseBet calcolato: 16389.00 bits
   Max consentito (1000x baseBet): 1000.00 bits
   VB attuale: 32975.26 bits
   Perdite accumulate: 23981.44 bits

ğŸ›‘ FERMANDO SCRIPT - Martingale esaurito, troppe perdite consecutive
CYCLE #13 LOST | Loss: -13636 bits | WR: 30.8% (4W/9L) | Loss Streak: 6/6 (1x) | Next VB: 51157 bits
